question: Which state government has decided to declare 2020 as Year of Artificial Intelligence (AI)?
explanation: The Telangana government has decided to declare 2020 as Year of Artificial Intelligence (AI) by organizing various activities related to the emerging technology. The state government has also signed pact with NITI Aayog,  which released  the \'National Strategy for Artificial Intelligence\' to run pilot projects in the state.
